titleStmt.title: The sea fight in the Road of Gibraltar the 25. of Aprill last, betwixt the K. of Spaines carackts and gallions, and the Hollandish men of warre, reported by a letter written a-bourd the Hollands fleete, by a commaunder in the same, and faithfully translated into English
Copye van een brief, geschreven door Joris van Spelbergh. English
titleStmt.author: Spilbergen, Joris van, 1568?-1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for Iohn Hardie, and are to be sold by Robert Iackson, at the shop vnder the Royall Exchaunge,

notesStmt.note: Probably a translation of "Copye van een brief, geschreven door Joris van Spelbergh [i.e. Spilbergen]" (Knuttel 1372). See also, however, Knuttel 1357, 1358, 1370, and 1371.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: The Spanish ouerthrow at sea by the Hollanders.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the shop vnder the Royall Exchaunge
